title: Apple’s multi-million investment to restore the Atlantic Forest
description:
Tech giant Apple announced a USD 80 million investment in reforestation projects targeting Brazil’s Atlantic Forest biome, drawing attention to the company’s environmental sustainability agenda. Teaming up with the Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company (TSMC) and Japanese component supplier Murata, Apple has promised to restore degraded lands and combat climate change in one of the world’s […]

The post Apple’s multi-million investment to restore the Atlantic Forest appeared first on The Brazilian Report.

title: Brazil creates twice as many formal jobs as a year ago
description:
Labor Ministry data shows that Brazil created 180,395 formal jobs in January, practically double the number posted a year earlier (90,031). The services (80,587 vacancies) and industrial (67,029) sectors boosted these hirings, reinforcing economists’ and analysts’ views that the country’s job market may show more resilience than expected. “All regions of the country are hiring […]

The post Brazil creates twice as many formal jobs as a year ago appeared first on The Brazilian Report.
